content:
Experience everything that makes NYC buzz! Join us at the Gates, a hotel in the heart of Midtown Manhattan West, where you’ll find yourself less than half a block from Times Square, the Theater District and Fifth Avenue, three blocks from Restaurant Row, and four from Rockefeller Center. Walk just a bit further and you’re at the Empire State Building, Central Park, and Greenwich Village.

Take in the sights and relax in style. Our look is distinct: made comfortable with exquisite lighting, interesting color schemes, and amenities throughout the hotel.
